file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 78-11-03-04 - EXHAUST FORCED MIXER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EXHAUST FORCED MIXER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the removal/install of the Exhaust Forced Mixer. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 78-11-03-000-801-A EXHAUST FORCED MIXER - REMOVAL EXHAUST FORCED MIXER - INSTALLA- ALL 78-11-03-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 78-11-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 78-11-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EXHAUST FORCED MIXER - REMOVAL A. General (1) To remove the exhaust forced mixer, obey the instructions in Rolls Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 78-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE EXHAUST NOZZLE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 78-31-01-000-801-A/400 THRUST REVERSER - REMOVAL Rolls Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Workstand To get access to the engine exhaust cone 1 F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine exhaust cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 78-11-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breaker as below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag on them. • Start 1 • Start 2 (3) Put the workstand in the work area. (4) Remove the Exhaust Nozzle (AMM TASK 78-11-01-000-801-A/400) or Thrust Reverser ( AMM TASK 78-31-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Remove the exhaust forced mixer. Refer to the last revision of Rolls Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 78-11-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 78-11-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. EXHAUST FORCED MIXER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To install the exhaust forced mixer, obey the instructions in Rolls Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 78-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE EXHAUST NOZZLE - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 78-31-01-400-801-A/400 THRUST REVERSER - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 78-31-01-700-801-A/500 THRUST REVERSER - OPERATIONAL CHECK Rolls Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Workstand To get access to the engine exhaust cone 1 F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine exhaust forced mixer I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 78-11-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Install the exhaust forced mixer. Refer to the last revision of Rolls Royce MM CSP 34022. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the Exhaust Nozzle (AMM TASK 78-11-01-400-801-A/400) or Thrust Reverser ( AMM TASK 78-31-01-400-801-A/400). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breaker as below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • Start 1 • Start 2 (3) If applicable, do a thrust reverser operational test ( AMM TASK 78-31-01-700-801-A/ 500) and examine for general conditions, oil leaks and correct operation. (4) Remove the workstand from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 78-11-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
